item.description: See the old gate locks that were used to raise and lower water level. This is a lovely area and a great place to spend a crisp winter day. Afterward, weâ€™ll go nearby for a delightful lunch. No charge for walk. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84W Exit 29 (left exit, Rt. 10 Milldale), end of ramp turn right onto Rt. 10S, go 5.5 miles (thru Cheshire center), turn right at Cornwall Ave. (Wachovia Bank on right corner), continue 3/4 miles to 2nd stop sign, go straight, parking on left near path.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting in the parking lot for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
